title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, July 9, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of Oliver Sacks (1933-2015), who explored phenomena of the brain in books like “Musicophilia” and “Seeing Voices.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
